title: Physicochemical, structural, and biological properties of novel water-soluble polysaccharide derived from the Tunisian Hammada scoparia plant and its application on beef meat preservation
content:
Publication date: 30 October 2024

Source: Heliyon, Volume 10, Issue 20

Author(s): Malek Eleroui, Amal Feki, Marwa Kraiem, Asma Hamzaoui, Zakaria Boujhoud, Ibtissem Ben Amara, Hatem Kallel
